test.name: Verify Successful Login

kw.name: Get Chrome Options Object
kw.doc: Tạo và trả về một đối tượng ChromeOptions đã cấu hình mạnh mẽ để tắt popup lưu mật khẩu và các thông báo khác, đặc biệt khi chạy headless trên Linux.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.msg: ${welcome_text} = You logged into a secure area! ×
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.msg: Element 'id=flash' contains text 'You logged into a secure area!'.
kw.arg: You logged into a secure area!
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Cleanup Chrome User Data Directory
kw.msg: Attempting to cleanup temporary user data directory: /tmp/chrome_profile_7qz7w4ny Successfully cleaned up temporary user data directory: /tmp/chrome_profile_7qz7w4ny

test.doc: This test case verifies successful login functionality

test.name: Verify Unsuccessful Login

kw.name: Get Chrome Options Object
kw.doc: Tạo và trả về một đối tượng ChromeOptions đã cấu hình mạnh mẽ để tắt popup lưu mật khẩu và các thông báo khác, đặc biệt khi chạy headless trên Linux.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.msg: Element 'id=flash' should have contained text 'You logged out of the secure area!' but its text was 'You logged into a secure area! ×'.
kw.arg: You logged out of the secure area!
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.
kw.status: Element 'id=flash' should have contained text 'You logged out of the secure area!' but its text was 'You logged into a secure area! ×'.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Cleanup Chrome User Data Directory
kw.msg: Attempting to cleanup temporary user data directory: /tmp/chrome_profile_uyzvyahz Successfully cleaned up temporary user data directory: /tmp/chrome_profile_uyzvyahz

test.doc: This test case verifies unsuccessful login functionality
test.status: Element 'id=flash' should have contained text 'You logged out of the secure area!' but its text was 'You logged into a secure area! ×'.
